```{r setup, include = FALSE}

library(USAboundaries)

map_id <- "meae.congressional.congress08.ct.county"
```

<div class="map">

```{r election-map, echo = FALSE}

  get_county_map_data() %>%
  filter(id != "cts_wr") %>% 
  map_counties(height = "350px", congress = 8)
```

</div>
